actionPoints.name: Action points
actionPoints.description: The higher the number, the more actions you can perform in a single V.A.T.S. round

carryWeight.name: Carry Weight
carryWeight.description: How much you can carry before you become overencumbered

companionNerve.name: Companion Nerve
companionNerve.description: How much bonus damage and defense your companions receive

criticalChance.name: Critical Chance
criticalChance.description: Chance that a hit will inflict critical damage

damageResistance.name: Damage Resistance
damageResistance.description: Any damage taken is reduced by this percentage. It is applied before DT. Only a few rare non-player characters use DR

damageThreshold.name: Damage Threshold
damageThreshold.description: This amount is subtracted from any damage taken

dehydration.name: Dehydration
dehydration.description: A meter that will tell you if the player is dehydrated or hydrated. (Hardcore mode)

fatigue.name: Fatigue
fatigue.description: How much special fatigue damage you can take before you are knocked unconscious

fireResistance.name: Fire Resistance
fireResistance.description: All fire damage you receive is reduced by this percentage

hitPoints.name: Hit Points
hitPoints.description: How much damage you can take before you die

poisonResistance.name: Poison Resistance
poisonResistance.description: All poison damage you receive is reduced by this percentage

radiationResistance.name: Radiation Resistance
radiationResistance.description: How adept your body is at ignoring exposure to radiation

reloadSpeed.name: Reload Speed
reloadSpeed.description: The reduction of the amount of time taken to reload a weapon

skillRate.name: Skill Rate
skillRate.description: How many skill points your character gains per level

starvation.name: Starvation
starvation.description: A meter that tells how hungry the player is. (Hardcore mode)

unarmedDamage.name: Unarmed Damage
unarmedDamage.description: Damage done with fists (damage of unarmed weapons is added to this value)
